name: Winterlord
description:
An agent of the state is dispatched to a remote village to investigate a group of rebels--and stop them before they can strike again. But the anonymous rebel leader seamlessly blends in with the crowd. In order to figure out who's calling the shots, you'll need to brave the elements as well as the villagers. Both can be confusing and deadly.

This game is a submission for Winter VN Jam 2021 - itch.io
